definitions.description: The base information of the organization, for which the solution is built.

constantValues: The base information of the organization, for which the solution is built.

members.name: organizationalprofileId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: statecode
members.description: Status of the Organizational Profile

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statecode_display' is added to the 'OrganizationalProfile' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statecode'
supportingAttribute.name: statecode_display
